Package game

Interface Summary
Force A convenient interface for dealing with genes and other objects that can apply a force.
 

Class Summary
Agent An Agent acted upon by both the World model and the GA.
EnergyPacket An energy packet found in the Symbibots world.
Entity The top level abstract definition of a game Entity.
EntityManager The manager class used by World to deligate en mass Entity operations like update().
Missile The Missile entity fired by agents, carries a certain amount of the Agents energy as a payload.
UserAgent A human players avatar in the Symbibots world, this can be extended in the future to accept network input for updating.
World The top level game class that is used by other packages to interact with the Symbibots world model.
